attributes.action: get the BBC to create a Country Music radio station.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the BBC to finally put together a BBC COUNTRY RADIO to play a wide range of country music 24/7, available on DAB and FM.

They have provided BBC 1Xtra to play what they describe as Black music, BBC Asian Network to play Asian music, BBC World Service to reach the people who don’t pay licence fees and BBC Radio 4 for people aged 98 and over.

How about listening to the licence fee payers and providing a station that they actually want?!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
